entry.title: BK Resources One Compartment Sink with Two Drainboard - 24" x 24" Compartment
entry.summary:
Vendor: BK Resources
Type: One Compartment Sinks
Price: 889.00

BK Resources One Compartment Sink with Two Drainboard - 24" x 24" Compartment

  • Dimensions 72"W x 29-13/16"D x 43-3/4"H
  • 18 Ga T-304 stainless steel constructed
  • 24" x 24" x 14" deep compartment
  • 24" drainboards on left & right
  • 9"H backsplash
  • 8" O.C. splash mount faucet holes
  • 1-1/2" rolled edges on front & sides
  • Includes basket drain (BKDR-4)
  • Galvanized steel legs
  • Adjustable high impact corrosion resistant feet
  • NSF
